name: Dish Dash
description:
• Up - Jump
  • Left / Right - Turn
  • Down - Action

Son, 

It has been seven years since I left the family behind to follow my dreams of blues fame. Though it has been a long while, and I have not seen you grow into a man, I wish to leave you the old family restaurant. It is not much to look at, and the clientele is impatient to a fault. But I am sure you can handle the challenge.

Remember son, the secret to good cooking is to follow your heart.

And never, ever, stop running.

Your Pop-Pop (AKA Bony Baby Fingers)

Dish Dash is a game made in 72 hours for Mini-Jam 38: Food. Limitations were the use of only the four arrow buttons as inputs. This was my first game jam! 

Came down to the wire and didn't get to test the numbers. Hope we don't crash too hard. Enjoy being the iron chef.

Customer Sprites by Pickleinspector

Player / Environment Sprites by NK

SFX / Coding / Other Sprites by T3tsuya

Music - Friendship Adventure - Ozzed Creative Commons license (CC BY-SA) 

Food Sprites - Free Pixel Food
